channel.title: Log On/Log Off
channel.description:
Looking for help with the code that will show when a players logs on, or logs off of the server on the chatbox for all players.
Just logs on it fine, unless someone can help with both. Here is my client.JAVA...
I did have the log on, but it stopped working :/
http://pastebin.org/480686
